plot: Children gain confidence as they read to therapy dogs at the Missoula Public Library in Montana as part of a weekly Reading Education Assistance Dogs (R.E.A.D.) program.
title: Reading to Dogs
plot_es: Children gain confidence as they read to therapy dogs at the Missoula Public Library in Montana as part of a weekly Reading Education Assistance Dogs (R.E.A.D.) program.
